name: RUN UNU RUN
description:
You are a fox named Unu who just keeps on running. There are a bunch of colourful balls that want to stop you from running. But Unu stops for no one, especially if they have balls.

RULES

  • Click on the balls to make them explode and gain points. 
  • You can activate and change the colour of your shield to match the colour of the balls to absorb them and gain HP, but you won't get points.
  • If a ball hits you and you have no shield, you lose 1 HP. 
  • If a ball hits you and your shield is a mismatching colour, you lose 2HP.

CONTROLS

  • Move: WASD keys or arrow keys
  • Click: click on the balls to destroy them
  • Change shield to the next type: E
  • Change shield to the previous type: Q

Music by https://www.instagram.com/danieltheworm/

Send me a screenshot of your high score to have your name featured here!
